channel.title: How do i do so everyone get auto mod when they login,

item.title: How do i do so everyone get auto mod when they login,
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

[quote=“Mitko, post:4, topic:284705”]Easy, go to Player.java
look for stuff similar to this

// Setting player standard look playerLook[0] = 2; playerLook[1] = 6; playerLook[2] = 7; playerLook[3] = 10; playerLook[4] = 5; playerLook[5] = 0;

Add

playerRights = 1;

Under them.
So that means every new character created gets mod rights.
Tested it and it works 100% (On delta)[/quote]thanks i love you! its work

Read full topic
item.source: How do i do so everyone get auto mod when they login,

item.title: How do i do so everyone get auto mod when they login,
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Easy, go to Player.java
look for stuff similar to this

// Setting player standard look playerLook[0] = 2; playerLook[1] = 6; playerLook[2] = 7; playerLook[3] = 10; playerLook[4] = 5; playerLook[5] = 0;

Add

playerRights = 1;

Under them.
So that means every new character created gets mod rights.
Tested it and it works 100% (On delta)

Read full topic
